name: Goldilocks and the three bears (Danielle Napian)
name_original: Goldilocks and the three bears (Danielle Napian)
description:
Goldilocks and the three bears (Danielle Napian) is a game developed by Danielle Napian. It was originally released in 2021.
Goldilocks and the three bears (Danielle Napian) is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
